CustomField.description: US-0009891 - Create new fields on Coupon and Coupon-Seller required for MC Coupon Flow
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When checked that the coupon will be whitelisted for the Marketing Cloud flow for sending emails to sellers. Otherwise the communication will be sent using the proprietary email templates/flows from Salesforce. This setting is set on the Coupon record.
CustomField.label: MC Whitelisted
